channel.title: Rubyweekly on Nazarii Sheremet
channel.description: Recent content in Rubyweekly on Nazarii Sheremet

item.title: How my post got into Ruby Weekly 343
item.description: Hi guys. A few days ago I wrote post about my problem with http-client mgems in mruby. There I described the work with my library mruby-smallhttp. And this post got into Ruby Weekly 343, here is the link. I dont know how they found my post, but I need to say thanks to Ruby Weekly team. The Ruby Weekly is “A free, onceâ€“weekly e-mail round-up of Ruby news and articles.
